channel.title: 安装 on 一缕书香一缕魂
channel.description: Recent content in 安装 on 一缕书香一缕魂

item.title: 软件开发工作环境搭建
item.description: 安装 FTP Server sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade sudo apt install vsftpd sudo systemctl start vsftpd sudo systemctl enable vsftpd # 如果要创建一个 FTP 用户 adduser someone mkdir -p /home/someone/ftp chown -R nobody:nogroup /home/someone/ftp chmod a-w /home/someone/ftp sudo mv /etc/vsftpd.conf /etc/vsftpd.conf.orig 安装 FileZilla FTP Client sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade sudo add-apt-repository ppa:sicklylife/filezilla sudo apt update sudo apt install filezilla
